entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 13 with temperature falling to 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 13 with temperature falling to 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Wind becoming south 20 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
